edges.label: 1. Report Compiled By
edges.tooltip: The NSA compiled the report based on SIGINT intercepts.

edges.label: 2. Subject of Intercept
edges.tooltip: The report includes intercepted communications involving Nicolas Sarkozy.

edges.label: 3. Subject of Intercept
edges.tooltip: The report includes intercepted communications involving Barack Obama.

edges.label: 4. Subject of Intercept
edges.tooltip: The report includes intercepted communications involving Pierre Vimont.

edges.label: 5. Subject of Intercept
edges.tooltip: The report includes intercepted communications involving Jean-David Levitte.

edges.label: 6. Planned Discussions
edges.tooltip: Sarkozy planned to discuss intelligence cooperation and military commitments with Obama.

edges.label: 7. Contract Prospect
edges.tooltip: EADS was discussed in relation to a tanker aircraft contract with the U.S. military.

edges.label: 8. Trademark Dispute
edges.tooltip: Pernod Ricard was involved in a trademark dispute requiring intervention.
